page.title: 03GAMES PLAYED BY A BOY OF TEN
page.content: At school I normally play Football. When the Football season is over we sometimes play Cricket.At home I play Football and sometimes my Dad has a game of Tennis with me in his spare time.When I am bored and have no one to play with I play on my computer.The games I play most are Planetoid,The Mine and Chuckie Egg.When my cousins come round at the weekend we play Rounders.When my friends come down to my house we play Hide and Seek or Stuck in the Mud. If it is raining we go inside and play on my computer or the Electronic Keyboard, which is an organ.
